mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rnh2.MEMBER (M_ID, PASSWORD, M_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE) VALUES ( #{ mId }, #{ password }, #{ mName }, #{ email }, #{ phone })
mapper.select: SELECT M_ID mId, PASSWORD, M_NAME mName, EMAIL, PHONE, M_COUNT mCount, M_POINT mPoint, USERTYPE, DELETED, REG_DATE regDate FROM rnh2.MEMBER WHERE M_ID = #{ mId } AND PASSWORD = #{ password } AND DELETED = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE rnh2.MEMBER SET DELETED ='1' WHERE M_ID = #{ mId };
mapper.select: SELECT M_ID mId, M_NAME mName, EMAIL, PHONE, M_POINT mPoint, USERTYPE, left(REG_DATE, 10) regDate FROM rnh2.MEMBER WHERE DELETED = '0'
SELECT EXISTS( select M_ID, POINT, CONTENT, left(REG_DATE, 10) FROM rnh2.MEMBER_HISTORY where M_ID = #{ mId } AND left(REG_DATE, 10) = curdate() AND CONTENT = #{ content } )
mapper.update: UPDATE rnh2.MEMBER_HISTORY SET REG_DATE = curdate() WHERE M_ID = #{ mId } AND left(REG_DATE, 10) = curdate() AND CONTENT = #{ content }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rnh2.MEMBER_HISTORY ( M_ID, POINT, CONTENT) VALUES ( #{ mId }, #{ point }, #{ content })
mapper.update: UPDATE rnh2.MEMBER SET M_POINT = (select sum(POINT) FROM rnh2.MEMBER_HISTORY where M_ID = #{ mId }) WHERE M_ID = #{ mId }
